snippet: Profit rose 0.9 percent to $3.43 billion, though the company sold less beer and other drinks compared with the first quarter of last year.
lead_paragraph: Profit rose 0.9 percent to $3.43 billion, though the company sold less beer and other drinks compared with the first quarter of last year.

headline.main: Anheuser-Busch InBev Reports a Small Profit Increase
headline.print_headline: Anheuser-Busch InBev Reports a Small Profit Increase
